summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Becky Martin. The documents primarily concern the payroll records of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) staff, focusing on individuals such as Cecelia T. Morton and Nancy P. Schultz, and the redaction of Social Security numbers for privacy reasons. The documents detail payroll authorizations, employment histories, and notifications regarding the postponement of releasing certain information.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Becky Martin has no significance in the JFK context.
